author: wn.com
title: Young people create moving exhibition on local WW1 stories (Richmond upon Thames London Borough Council) ...
text: ( Source : Richmond upon Thames London Borough Council ) Coordinated by Hounslow Friends of Faith and Richmond SACRE, the children from The Queen's , Darrell and Archdeacon Cambridge primary schools will stage an exhibition using local stories
